name: REBELS ARCADE
description:
The centralised world has been disbanded. Out of the ashes an alliance of Space Rebels have decided to embrace this opportunity for change. These brave explorers will discover exciting new worlds, in the Cosmos searching for adventure and treasure.

1. Collect crypto coins and add to your highest score

2. Collect rare treasure boxes and add NFTs to your loot

3. Go on quests to find hidden rooms and challenges

4. Defeat enemies and survive to take on the Boss

5. Challenge your friends and play to earn

Tips :  "Space" To jump, "Double Space" To double jump,  and "V" to attack with your sword and "C" to attack with your ELECTRIC BALL! 

that all enjoy ;)
